task.title: Creating combined maps
task.shortdesc: You can combine maps together by reference. This lets you create smaller, more manageable maps, for example factored by audience or information type, yet still produce output with all the necessary related links and navigation.

taskbody.context: When you build based on the main map, the referenced maps will be included in the output navigation, and the target topics will be published in whatever the output format is. Related links are also processed.

step.cmd: Add a <topicref> element to the map.

taskbody.result: You now have a topic reference that will be used to include the target map in the output, with links added to related topics in the same hierarchy or relationship table.
